thread.title: Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024
thread.title_full: Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024

author: VideoElephant
title: Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024
text: At the start of the new year, 22 states and 43 cities and counties are increasing the hourly minimum wage, benefiting nearly 10 million people. And that doesn't only affect workers at major fast food chains or retail outlets; it also includes people who work at small, locally-owned businesses. spotlight Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024 - VideoElephant - - [0](https://nonpareilonline.com/news/nation-world/government-politics/millions-of-u-s-workers-will-see-a-pay-increase-in-2024/article_3e08e9f0-8e1d-5613-9ad2-962a7ef2011f.html?mode=comments) Related to this story Most Popular Maine has removed former President Donald Trump from the state’s presidential primary ballot under the Constitution’s insurrection clause in a… [ Morning headlines: Trump invokes Nazi-era 'blood' rhetoric against immigrants as Senate border security talks grind on](/news/nation-world/government-politics/border-security-fake-electors-israel-hamas-north-korea/article_9ef11479-b2c9-56a1-ba62-b83d7a3fdc4e.html) Today's other top stories include Israel being pressed for a more targeted approach in Gaza, fake electors from 2020 that are involved in the … Michigan's Supreme Court is keeping former President Donald Trump on the state's primary election ballot.
